articles.author: Express Web Desk
articles.title: 3 coaches of Korba-Visakhapatnam Express catch fire, passengers safe - The Indian Express
articles.description: The fire began near the A1 coach, prompting alert passengers to raise an alarm. Railway officials then assisted everyone in safely evacuating the train, even as the flames spread to three coaches.
articles.content:
Three AC coaches of the Korba-Visakhapatnam Express were gutted by fire on Sunday morning shortly after the train arrived at Visakhapatnam railway station, Andhra Pradesh.
The fire began near the A1… [+519 chars]
